*** Sat, 3 Sep 2016 22:32:35 ***
TEST FOR GRANGER-CAUSALITY:
H0: "realgdp, realinv" do not Granger-cause "realcons"

Test statistic l = 3.1404
pval-F( l; 8, 555) = 0.0017 

TEST FOR INSTANTANEOUS CAUSALITY:
H0: No instantaneous causality between "realgdp, realinv" and "realcons"

Test statistic: c = 71.0006
pval-Chi( c; 2) = 0.0000
